items.title: Zelensky's chief of staff resigns after Ukrainian anti-corruption police raid home
items.description: Yermak, 54, has been Zelensky's closest adviser throughout Russia's full-scale war.

items.title: Thirteen killed in deadliest Israeli raid for months in southern Syria
items.description: The village of Beit Jinn came under attack in what Israel said was an operation against a militant group.

items.title: National Guard member dies after shooting in Washington DC
items.description: Sarah Beckstrom, 20, succumbed to her injuries, while a second guardsman remains in critical condition, Donald Trump says.

items.title: Lightning detected on Mars for the first time, scientists say
items.description: Researchers heard electric crackles on 28 hours of recordings made over two Martian years.

items.title: Eight more arrested over fire in Hong Kong that killed at least 128 people
items.description: Authorities say 89 bodies are unidentified and 79 people remain injured after Wednesday's blaze.
